Assist.description: Intelligent virtual assistant / Ticket system built to resolve technical questions and report malfunctioning of the platform where it is implemented.
longDescription: The UDG (Universidad de Guadalajara) has at its disposal its own system for the financial management of its academic centers known as the SIGI system (Integral Management and Information System).

Unfortunately, the UDG software development team, in addition to their tasks as programmers, also had to be in charge of answering questions and reports on the SIGI platform, which greatly hindered the development of other systems.

The solution given to the previous problem was achieved thanks to the Assist project, which was in charge of attending to the most recurring issues through artificial intelligence and delegating those more complex incidents to technical personnel.

One month after its implementation, the reports sent through means outside the same platform have almost completely ceased, and the user experience of the SIGI system has improved, since the vast majority of problems can be attended to immediately instead of wait hours or days until a technical assistant solves it for us.

Typed.description: Minigame to improve typing skills on the computer keyboard using all fingers optimally.
longDescription: This minigame is a recreation of one of my first web applications (Me-k-no).

This challenge consists of writing the phrases that are displayed on the screen as quickly as possible, in order to improve your skills and dexterity when typing on a computer keyboard using all your fingers.

The reason for creating this web page was to apply my knowledge of all the different technologies related to web development that I have learned over time and compare my progress since that first version back in 2020.

This Cord.description: This Cord is a clone of the famous messaging and video calling application known as Discord.
longDescription: The first time we demo a messaging application, we usually create something quite simplified, in which there is only one global chat where anyone can communicate and see the messages of the rest.

In my case I went a little further, because I created a system to be able to start conversations privately, that is, Direct Messages (DM). And if that weren't enough, I decided to adopt the interface that Discord uses to practice implementing already established designs.

Instantgrams.description: Responsive clone of the home page of instagram.
longDescription: Generally, when learning a backend or frontend library/framework, a CRUD system (Create, Read, Update, Delete) is usually carried out to practice this knowledge. In my case, I preferred to do something a little more original than a simple system that lists the elements from a database.

This web page is a clone of the Instagram home page. The objective of its creation was precisely to practice two new technologies that I had just learned, which were spring-boot for the backend and Angular for the frontend.
